Subject: RE: Subpoena to 
Hi -
I have completed the requested subpoena for N722JE and sent it to our general counsel for review. I should hear back 
from him next week and will forward directly to you. Thank you and please contact me with any questions. Have a great 
weekend. 
The FAA and will be closed Monday, 11 September in honor of Indigenous Peoples' Day. 
Callie Meier 
Document Specialist 
Tel: 
or Fax: 
Ask me about Title Insurance for your aircraft! 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 2021 2:13 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Subpoena to 
0  O O 
Hi Callie, 
(USANYS) 
Thank you again for the call this afternoon. Attached is the subpoena we discussed. Please feel free to give me a call if 
you have any questions. 
Thanks, 
EFTA00020100

Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 Saint Andrews Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00020101
